title: OriginSTANDARD Reference Verifier Capsule
description: Frozen reference verifier capsule: immutable anchors, paths, and invariants.

attestation_policy.rule: time-external; TAO is the sole temporal authority

verification_invariants.json_canonicalization: RFC8785 JCS; NFC strings; sorted keys; UTF-8; finite numbers only; no NaN/Inf
verification_invariants.merkle_tree: Merkle v2; SHA-256; leaf prefix 0x00; node prefix 0x01; RFC6962 promotion

governance.patent_status: Filed and pending assignment to Origin Standard LLC (2026)

footer.note: This manifest contains no temporal authority. Time, if needed, is proven only by a valid TAO bound to artifacts.law_hash.

anchor.semantics: Git commit and tree anchor this manifest and referenced artifacts. Any modification constitutes a fork.
